## Pre-Commit Checklist

- [ ] I ran `./scripts/health-check.sh` and all checks pass
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding style (ktlint, detekt)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] I have updated documentation as needed
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have checked for Kotlin coroutine/concurrency compliance

- [ ] Touch targets meet minimum size (48dp)
- [ ] Color contrast ratios are sufficient
- [ ] Screen reader navigation works correctly
